meanings: (뒤로) step[stand] back, go[move] back(ward), back off, (놀람·무서움 등으로) draw back (=물러서다)

meanings.meaning: more(=rather) retiring in disposition than otherwise

vlive.korean: 제가 물러날 시간이 됐는데요. It's time for me to go. 듣기 View video Glorious Entertainment : (이호원)Holy
vlive.english: It's time for me to go.

vlive.korean: 하나 여기 있어. - 우리 뒤로 슬슬 물러날 때가 됐어. There's one here. - We're about to back up now. 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [알방라이브] VICTON 빅톤 막방을 앞둔 빅토니들의 자세!
vlive.english: There's one here. - We're about to back up now.

vlive.korean: 어쩔 수 없어요. 뒤로 물러날 곳이 없어요. 모두가 원하고 있어. 시청자 1,200명이 원하고 있어. Anyways, everyone wants you to do that. 1,200 viewers want that. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : MATILDA - 마틸다 '마틸다를 위한 힐!링!방!송!'
vlive.english: Anyways, everyone wants you to do that. 1,200 viewers want that.

vlive.korean: 일부러 몇 발자... 물러나인가? Purposely a couple... Is it go away? 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [🎬] 째니타임즈⏰ EP.23 가요대제전 현장 비하인드
vlive.english: Purposely a couple... Is it go away?

vlive.korean: 일부러 몇 발자국 물러나~ I take a couple of steps back purposely. 듣기 View video KIM JAEHWAN(김재환) : [🎬] 째니타임즈⏰ EP.23 가요대제전 현장 비하인드
vlive.english: I take a couple of steps back purposely.

examples.korean: The smart money says that he’s likely to withdraw from the leadership campaign. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전문가들은 그가 당 대표 경선에서 물러날 것 같다고 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The smart money says that he’s likely to withdraw from the leadership campaign. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has finally decided it’s time to bow out of international tennis. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 마침내 국제 테니스계에서 물러날 때가 되었다고 결심을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has finally decided it’s time to bow out of international tennis. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I am in for it now. or I have gone too far to retreat. or I cannot withdraw[turn back] now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물러날래야 물러날 수 없다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I am in for it now. or I have gone too far to retreat. or I cannot withdraw[turn back] now. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Because of the public pressure, she had no alternative but to resign. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 여론에 밀려 자리에서 물러날 수밖에 없었다. Neungyule
examples.english: Because of the public pressure, she had no alternative but to resign. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And, so far, he shows no sign of shying away from big battles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아직까지는 일대 결전에서 물러날 기미를 보이지 않는다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: And, so far, he shows no sign of shying away from big battles. Add to Wordbook
